sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { BaseChartDirective } from 'ng2-charts'; import { Chart, ChartConfiguration, ChartData, ChartType } from 'chart.js'; import { NewsService } from '../../core/services/news.service'; import { UserService } from '../../core/services/user.service'; import { News, NewsStatistics } from '../../core/models/news.model'; import { User } from '../../core/models/user.model'; import { LoadingComponent } from '../../shared/components/loading/loading.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule, LoadingComponent, BaseChartDirective], template: `

Dashboard

{{ (statistics$ | async)?.totalNews || 0 }}
Total News
{{ (statistics$ | async)?.publishedNews || 0 }}
Published
{{ (statistics$ | async)?.archivedNews || 0 }}
Archived
{{ (activeUsers$ | async)?.length || 0 }}
Active Users
Recent News
View All
{{ news.title }}

{{ news.summary }}

{{ news.author }} {{ news.publishDate | date:'mediumDate' }}
{{ tag }}
News by Tag
News Published by Month
` }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { statistics$: Observable; activeUsers$: Observable; isLoading$: Observable; recentNews$: Observable; tagChartData: ChartData<'doughnut'>; chartOptions: ChartConfiguration['options']; monthlyChartData: ChartData<'line'>; lineChartOptions: ChartConfiguration['options']; constructor(private newsService: NewsService, private userService: UserService) { // Mock implementations for demonstration this.statistics$ = this.newsService.getStatistics(); this.activeUsers$ = this.userService.getAll(); this.isLoading$ = this.newsService.isLoading$; this.recentNews$ = this.newsService.getRecentNews(); this.tagChartData = { labels: [], datasets: [] }; this.chartOptions = {}; this.monthlyChartData = { labels: [], datasets: [] }; this.lineChartOptions = {}; } ngOnInit(): void {} }
